Name: DNA #2
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Created in 2005 by Tonin Kacaj at Maze in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of DNA #2 contains 219 calories
